In

1927

By
1924

Egorov

Chebotaryov received his doctorate from the

with a doctoral thesis based on his
1922

1928
having been offered posts at both Kazan and Leningrad. He remained in Kazan all his life.
Chebotaryov worked on the algebra of polynomials, in particular examining the distribution of the zeros. He also studied
Galois theory
writing a two volume textbook
Basic Galois Theory

1937)

1936

Lie groups

(1940)

Galois
